project.heading: Modern Website Design & Development for Vehicle Sales
project.brief:
Objective:

To design and develop a modern, responsive website for showcasing and selling vehicles. The website will feature a clean and crisp design with large images, ensuring optimal performance on smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers.

Scope of Work:

  1. Homepage:
    • Image Slider: Feature a large image slider promoting three featured vehicles for sale, each with a call-to-action section and a button link to the vehicle's detailed page.
    • Vehicle Grid: Display 6-8 vehicles in a grid format on desktop, with the number reducing on smaller devices. Each vehicle entry will include the name, price, and a short description, linking to the vehicle's full page.
    • Instagram Feed: Integrate an Instagram feed showcasing recent posts.
    • Contact Information: Include contact details and links to social media pages.
    • Mailchimp Form: Add a Mailchimp form for collecting email addresses for stock updates and future marketing campaigns.
  2. About Us Page:
    • Provide information about the business, featuring a photo and possibly showcasing some personal vehicles to build a connection with potential buyers.
  3. Sell Your Car Page:
    • Provide information for individuals looking to sell their cars, detailing the process, commissions, etc. This page will be similar in format to the About Us page.
  4. Inventory Page:
    • Display all cars for sale in a grid format, similar to the homepage vehicle section.
    • Implement hover effects to indicate more information.
    • Enable sorting of vehicles by make, price (low/high), and other specified details.
    • Each vehicle entry will link to a detailed page with full information.
  5. Vehicle Detail Page:
    • Feature a large image slider occupying one-third of the page, with vehicle technical specifications to the right.
    • Include detailed vehicle information below this section.
    • Provide a call-to-action button for inquiries and options to share the vehicle on social media.
    • Include contact information and navigation options to return to the inventory page or view the next/previous vehicle.
  6. Previously Sold Page:
    • Similar in design to the inventory page but without links to detailed pages and without prices.
  7. Contact Us Page:
    • Include a contact form, email address, telephone number, and postal address.
    • Optionally feature a map of the location and information about booking viewings if applicable.

Deliverables:

  • A modern, responsive website with a clean design and large images.
  • A homepage with a featured vehicle slider, vehicle grid, Instagram feed, contact information, and Mailchimp form.
  • Additional pages: About Us, Sell Your Car, Inventory, Vehicle Detail, Previously Sold, and Contact Us.
  • Enhanced user experience with hover effects, sorting options, and detailed vehicle information pages.
  • Full integration with social media and email marketing tools.

This project aims to create a visually appealing, user-friendly, and highly functional website that effectively promotes vehicle sales and engages potential buyers.
